uk.co.strangeskies.utilities

Class ObservableImpl<M>

  • java.lang.Object
    • uk.co.strangeskies.utilities.ObservableImpl<M>
  • Type Parameters:
    M - The type of event message to produce
    All Implemented Interfaces:
    Observable<M>

    public class ObservableImpl<M>
extends Object
implements Observable<M>
    A simple implementation of Observable which maintains a list of listeners to receive events fired with fire(Object).
